Package net.egartley.gamelib.objects

Class MapSector

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.egartley.gamelib.abstracts.MapSector
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Sector1, Sector2, Sector3, Sector4
    public abstract class MapSector
extends java.lang.Object
    Specific part, or area, of a map
    See Also:
    Map
